attributes.action: 7 day working week for Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
I fully support the concept of seven day working in the NHS.

I think that this principle should be applied to all walks of public life to improve the service we provide to our patients and the public.

I am calling on our representatives to show leadership and set the standard nationally for this by working seven days a week.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House/Parliament
